name: Jay Jay Dating Sim: Jay Jay's Basement of Fun
name_original: Jay Jay Dating Sim: Jay Jay's Basement of Fun
description:
Join Jay Jay and Friends in their basement of fun!

Submission to the PET CS Club Game Jam.

Controls:

[W][A][S][D] - Movement
[Space] - Jump
Mouse - Look around
[E] - Interact
[Enter or Space] - Next dialogue (for visual novel component)
[Shift] - Sprint
[Control] - Crouch
[Escape] - Return to start menu

Audio credits:

TheAsianOnes
freesound.org

Github Repo: https://github.com/hpnrep6/PETCSClubJam-JJDS_JJBOF

Note: MacOS export is broken beyond being playable. Running the Windows export through wine might be a better option.
